channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 4 Stocks With Impressive Shareholder Yield to Safeguard Your Portfolio

Real ID requirement kicks in today at airports across U.S.
item.description: Wednesday marks the first day U.S. travelers flying domestically will be required to show a Real ID at airports.

item.title: 1 student killed, 2 hurt in stabbing outside their high school; suspects at large
item.description: One student was killed and two others were wounded in a stabbing outside their Southern California high school, authorities said.

item.title: Civil rights leaders say acquittals in Tyre Nichols’ death highlight the need for police reform

item.description: Before you pay off credit card debt with money from an inheritance, there are factors you should consider first.

item.title: Watch Live: Trump unveiling U.S.-U.K. trade deal today
item.description: President Trump posted on social media that it "should be a very big and exciting day for the United States of America and the United Kingdom."

item.title: House approves bill renaming Gulf of Mexico as "Gulf of America"
item.description: The bill would codify the name change, though it would carry no authority outside the U.S.

item.title: Trump admin live updates: Trump announcing trade deal with UK
item.description: This will mark the first agreement after President Donald Trump imposed steep tariffs on dozens of trading partners.

item.title: Papal conclave live updates: Cardinals return for afternoon session
item.description: Catholic cardinals are gathering at the Vatican to elect the successor to Pope Francis, who died on April 21.
